posts.name: Beyonce
posts.review: Simplicity is both the pro and con of Notepad++.Does it's job and no one can deny that but it will be a  love it or hate it situation depending on how much you relly on addons.

posts.name: Sean Rusell
posts.review: No sugar coating on this one. Does what it does and does it the best.

posts.name: Roxy
posts.review: One of the best document editors I've seen.It's easy and usable. It's also free.
